messages.title: STANDING UP FOR WHAT MATTERS
messages.content: SAVING THE NHS, AFFORDABLE HOMES FOR ALL, FAIR FUNDING FOR LOCAL SCHOOLS, A VOTE ON THE TERMS OF BREXIT, FIGHTING AUSTERITY, ACTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring that our most vulnerable members are properly supported.
Work with local campaigners fighting oil drilling and take immediate and decisive action to improve public transport and tackle the congestion on our roads.
Demand fair funding for our schools, an end to SATS and a balanced and age appropriate curriculum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A VOTE ON THE TERMS OF BREXIT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Insist that our NHS and social care, the police and fire services are fully funded.
Work to ensure that everyone has an affordable home with good transport links and secure, meaningful work whilst at the same time protecting the environment and tackling climate change.

issues.education: Demand fair funding for our schools, an end to SATS and a balanced and age appropriate curriculum.
issues.environment: Work to ensure that everyone has an affordable home with good transport links and secure, meaningful work whilst at the same time protecting the environment and tackling climate change.
issues.health: Ensuring that our most vulnerable members are properly supported. Will insist that our NHS and social care, the police and fire services are fully funded.

housing.content: Work to ensure that everyone has an affordable home with good transport links.

leaflet.personalStatement: “As your MP I will never forget that I work for you. The Green Party is a party of social and environmental good, which wants to transform society for the benefit of all, and for the planet as a whole. I can't guarantee you that as your MP I will achieve this, but I can tell you that I will give it my best shot.”

contactInformation.address: SWAT Marketing Ltd, 74 Preston Road, Brighton, East Sussex, BN1 4QG

quotes.text: “As your MP I will never forget that I work for you. The Green Party is a party of social and environmental good, which wants to transform society for the benefit of all, and for the planet as a whole. I can't guarantee you that as your MP I will achieve this, but I can tell you that I will give it my best shot.”

images.caption: Image of Jo Prior with the text 'VOTE FOR JO PRIOR'
